Posted By: yyukichigai (7/3/2011 1:37:55 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
There are 21 creatures that have toughness greater than or equal to 3 with CMC 1 (because everyone needs early drops, and I doubt you want them to die when this falls).  
  
Ideally they need to be able to attack, otherwise its pointless to play this. There are 13 that don't have defender.  
  
[Death's Shadow](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Death's Shadow) doesn't really count, and its doubtful it really needs +2 power. (12)  
 [Phyrexian Dreadnought](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name= Phyrexian Dreadnought) may work with this, since it counts power, you may be able to get it out turn four (after dropping this) or turn five.  
[Sleeper Agent](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sleeper Agent) also doesn't count. (11)  
  
Here are the remaining cards that work alright to pretty well with the giant Vibrator (in no order)  
[Alabaster Leech](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Alabaster Leech)  
 [Brass Man](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name= Brass Man)  
[Kraken Hatchling](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kraken Hatchling)  
[Llanowar Augur](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Llanowar Augur)  
 [Rogue Elephant](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name= Rogue Elephant)  
[Skyshroud Ridgeback](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Skyshroud Ridgeback)  
[Straw Golem](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Straw Golem)  
[Tethered Griffin/](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tethered Griffin/)... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
